settings.content:
Since 2010, Calexico has been the ultimate destination for international luxury fashion and industry-leading styling services, bringing the best of global style to Brisbane and beyond.

Nestled in the heart of the renowned James Street Precinct in Fortitude Valley in Brisbane, Calexico has grown to encompass an expansive womenswear boutique, a dedicated menswear boutique, and an innovative e-commerce platform that connects clients worldwide.

With a carefully curated selection of over 125 coveted international designers—including Nili Lotan, Isabel Marant, Jimmy Choo, Ulla Johnson, Gianvito Rossi and Blazé Milano —Calexico offers an unparalleled shopping experience.

From statement event wear to timeless wardrobe classics, every piece embodies the signature Calexico aesthetic: understated, effortless, yet undeniably elevated.

With over 20 years of experience in retail across Australia, my journey started in Perth before spending years in Melbourne and Sydney, immersing myself in the industry and learning everything there is to know about fashion and styling. When I moved to Brisbane, I saw a gap in the market - a city craving a luxury multi-brand boutique that exclusively stocked international designers. And so, Calexico was born.

My vision was to create more than just a shopping destination - I wanted a space where women and men felt comfortable dropping in, discovering the latest fashion, and enjoying a truly elevated experience. Whether you're looking for the perfect outfit for a European summer getaway, a snow trip, or simply updating your everyday wardrobe, we pride ourselves on curating an extensive selection - everything from lingerie and fragrance to the largest denim collection in Australia, statement footwear, and an ever-growing fine jewellery offering.

At Calexico, we’re more than just a boutique - we’re a community. Our team is warm, experienced, and honest, genuinely invested in why you're shopping as much as what you're shopping for. For us, it’s never just about the dress or the shoes you leave with - it’s about the connection, the experience, and making sure you feel incredible every time you walk through our doors.
